import React from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import Footer from "../footer/Footer"; export default function Checkout({cart, setCart, isScrolled, user, setUser}) { const subTotal = cart.reduce((a, c) => { return a + (c.furniture.price * c.quantities); }, 0); const shipping = 50; const tax = subTotal * .2; const total = subTotal + shipping + tax; const token = localStorage.getItem("jwt"); const navigate = useNavigate(); function handleClick() { fetch('https://haus-db.onrender.com/orders', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', Authorization: `Bearer ${token}`, }, body: JSON.stringify({ 'total_price': total, 'user_id': user.id, 'items': JSON.stringify(cart), }) }).then(r => r.json()) .then(data => { setUser(data.user); navigate('/'); return fetch(`https://haus-db.onrender.com/users/clear_bag/${user.id}`, { method: 'DELETE', headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` } }) }).then(r => r.json()) .then(data => { setCart(data.user.cart_items) }) } return (
{cart.length !== 0 &&

Order Information

{cart.map(item => { return (

{item.furniture.name}

USD {item.furniture.price.toLocaleString()}

x{item.quantities}

) })}

Subtotal

USD {subTotal.toLocaleString()}

Shipping

USD {shipping}

Taxes

USD {tax.toLocaleString()}

Total

USD {total.toLocaleString()}

Shipping Information

First Name

Last Name

Address

Phone

Payment Information

Card Number

Cardholder Name

Expiration Date

Security Code

}
) }
